item.description:
Paper City Brewery offers a beer tasting on Thursdays and Fridays from 6PM to 8PM. For one low price $6 you can sample beer and hear a band! It's a little difficult to find but well worth the trouble. It's located in the industrial section of Holyoke and if there are any signs I haven't seen them. The first time we went we found it by following the crowd of people walking into an old factory.

It's usually crowded and loud, but it's also lots of fun.

If you get a table - bring some cards! Good Idea from those young wipper snappers.
Play for who goes to the bar for the group.

Hey all this is fully copied from the "That's not a beer. This is a beer." meetup that I went to. I had a great time.

And there is more, after Paper City closes down - Stony's (South Hadley) is down the road a brew pub, food, beer, pool, music and sports on the b-tubes.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be near the table's get there early!
item.name: Paper City Brewery a ton of fun - in a crowd
